post:
**Psychz Networks** offers DDoS mitigation on a stable, multi-homed network that covers the following global locations:


-- Los Angeles
-- Dallas
-- Chicago
-- Ashburn
-- São Paulo
-- London
-- Amsterdam
-- Barcelona
-- Johannesburg
-- Mumbai
-- Singapore
-- Moscow
-- Taipei
-- Tokyo
-- Sydney
-- Seoul **(Newly Launched!)**


**Our Motto**: Quality Network & Quality Customer Service

**Dedicated Server Features:**

- 1 Gbps, 5 Gbps, 10 Gbps, 20Gbps Ports!
- Unlimited/Unmetered Bandwidth Plans
- Up to 500 Gbps DDoS Protection
- Anycast, IPMI, Firewall, Private Networking
- ASN Announcement
- API access for management
- cPanel/Plesk Fully Managed Hosting

**Network Features:**

- 5+ Tbps Network Connectivity
- 16 Globally Distributed Data Centers
- Automatic Route Optimization
- Asia Pacific Low Latency Routes
- You can view our ASN here: https://bgp.he.net/AS40676

**F.A.Q.**

**Q: Do you work with MSP’s, VAR’s, Channel Partners?**
A: Yes, please see our reseller section or get in touch with us at sales [at] psychz.net

**Q: How long have you been in business?**
A: Psychz Networks - Since 2001; Profuse Solutions - Since 1999

**Q: When does the bandwidth reset?**
A: Bandwidth is reset on the due date of your server.

**Q: Do you allow adult content?**
A: Yes, we allow legal adult content on our servers.

**Q: Do you allow VPN & proxies on your server?**
A: Yes, you we allow VPN & proxies on our servers.

**Q: What methods do you accept for payment?**
A: Currently we accept all Major Credit Cards, Paypal, and Alipay.


If you have any further questions or comments please contact us at sales (at) psychz.net
